names.english: eliminate dampness and relieve toxicity decoction
names.commonEnglish: Eliminate Dampness and Relieve Toxicity Decoction

actions: Clears Heat, resolves Fire-toxicity, expels Wind and dries Dampness.
Releases the Exterior and clears Damp-Heat.
Strengthens the Spleen, resolves Dampness, clears Heat, expels pus and clears Damp-Heat.
Clears Damp-Heat from the skin and relieves toxicity.
With Bai Xian Pi, for skin lesions associated with Damp-Heat .
Clears Heat, reduces Fire, eliminates irritability, drains Damp-Heat, cools and activates the Blood, relieves toxicity and reduces swelling.
With Mu Dan Pi, resolves Qi Level Stagnation leading to Heat and Heat in the Blood.
With Hua Shi, for Damp-Heat in the Urinary Bladder.
Clears Heat, cools, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, drains pus and reduces swelling.
Clears Heat, resolves Fire toxicity, vents and disperses External Wind-Heat and clears Damp-Heat from the Lower Jiao.
With Jin Yin Hua, for various Heat disorders.
Clears Heat (especially in the Upper Jiao), relieves toxicity, reduces abscesses, dissipates clumps and clears Blood Heat.
With Jin Yin Hua, for initial-stage Wind-Heat.
Clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity and clears hot sores.
Promotes urination.
Expels Damp-Heat.
Clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity and moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.
With Jin Yin Hua, for Damp rashes or acne.
Eliminates Dampness
Relieves toxicity
Invigorates the Blood
Dispels Stasis

symptoms: Deep, inflamed nodules and pus-filled cysts on an erythematous base
The face, chest and back are generally involved
The residual scarring is generally pitted
A sensation of Heat throughout the body
